achievements.label: A WARRIOR UNTO ETERNITY
achievements.descriptionLocked: Before me go monsters, and after me comes war, in all its fire and glory.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: Before me go monsters, and after me comes war, in all its fire and glory.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>Before me go monsters, and after me comes war, in all its fire and glory.<i>

[At Rome, you became a Name of the Lionsmith.]

achievements.label: THE EMPTY VICTORY
achievements.descriptionLocked: So, I tell you this, my friend - my enemy - I am coming for you.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: So, I tell you this, my friend - my enemy - I am coming for you.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>So, I tell you this, my friend - my enemy - I am coming for you.<i>

[You fought an exceptional campaign, but you were not fulfilled in the end, and now seek an end in battle.]

achievements.label: LAST ONE STANDING
achievements.descriptionLocked: And without betrayal, there would be an end to war. Wouldn’t that be a shame?
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: And without betrayal, there would be an end to war. Wouldn’t that be a shame?
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>And without betrayal, there would be an end to war. Wouldn’t that be a shame?<i>

[You fought a diligent campaign and made a career of violence, but it all went wrong. Or right, perhaps.]

achievements.label: A LION SLUMBERS
achievements.descriptionLocked: But that is a matter for tomorrow - today is today. And today it is peaceful.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: But that is a matter for tomorrow - today is today. And today it is peaceful.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>But that is a matter for tomorrow - today is today. And today it is peaceful.<i>

[You fought a crude campaign, retired from violence, and eventually found something like peace.]

achievements.label: PRO PATRIA MORI
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I fell in battle.<i>

[You suffered five Wounds and Debilitations, and perished.]

achievements.label: HEROISM'S LIE
achievements.descriptionLocked: My spirit broke. Now nothing matters.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: My spirit broke. Now nothing matters.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>My spirit broke. Now nothing matters.<i>

[You suffered five Traumas, and lost the will to go on.]

achievements.label: MOUSE AND LION
achievements.descriptionLocked: I met a terrifying foe in single combat, and drew her blood in sight of the old gods.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I met a terrifying foe in single combat, and drew her blood in sight of the old gods.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I met a terrifying foe in single combat, and drew her blood in sight of the old gods.<i>

[You challenged the Edge-Long called Continental to a duel, and won.]

achievements.label: THE PRICE OF COWARDICE
achievements.descriptionLocked: I will not be found. I will not be remembered.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I will not be found. I will not be remembered.
achievements.unlockMessage:
<i>I will not be found. I will not be remembered.<i>

[You were late to your duel, and the Edge-Hours punished you for it.]
